and.name: TPCalculatorSPL
and.description: Calculator software product line. Designed for a variaty of users.
Calculator software product line. Designed for a variaty of users.

and.name: Operations
and.description: Operations the user can choose from.
Operations the user can choose from.

or.name: Base
or.description: Basic Operations supported by a common calculator.
Basic Operations supported by a common calculator.

feature.name: Addition
feature.description: Addition: Summ up two Numbers.

feature.name: Subtraction
feature.description: Subtraction: subtract two numbers.

feature.name: Multiplication
feature.description: Multiplication: Multiplicate two Numbers.

feature.name: Division
feature.description: Division: Divide two Numbers. If the divisor is 0 the solution is 0.

or.name: advanced
or.description: Advanced operation not every user needs. For example: Roots, Potencies, Angleoperations, Statisticaloperations.
Advanced operation not every user needs. For example: Roots, Potencies, Angleoperations, Statisticaloperations.

or.name: Roots
or.description: Operations to take the root of n-th degree from a given Number.
Operations to take the root of n-th degree from a given Number.

feature.name: SqrR
feature.description: SquareRoot: Take the squareroot of a given Number. If a negtive Value is given the solution wil be 0.

feature.name: Root3
feature.description: Root3: Take the root of 3rd degree of a given Number. If the given Number is negative the result is 0.

or.name: Potencies
or.description: Build the n-th power of a given Number.
Build the n-th power of a given Number.

feature.name: P2O
feature.description: Power2Of: Buld the second power of a given Number.

feature.name: P3O
feature.description: Power3Of: Build the third power a given number.

feature.name: P4O
feature.description: Power4Of: Build the fourth power of a given number.

or.name: AngleOps
or.description: Provide at least one of the basic angle operations for the user. Supported Operations: Sinus, Cosinus, Tangent.
Provide at least one of the basic angle operations for the user. Supported Operations: Sinus, Cosinus, Tangent.

feature.name: Sin
feature.description: Sinus: Calculate the sinus of a given angle. Results in the degree system.

feature.name: Cos
feature.description: Cosinus: Calculate the Cosinus of a given angle. Results are in the degree system.

feature.name: Tan
feature.description: Tangent: Calculate the tangent of a given angle. Results are in the degree system.

or.name: Statistical
or.description: Provide statistical operations experienced users. Provided operations: Standard Deviation, Mean.
Provide statistical operations experienced users. Provided operations: Standard Deviation, Mean.

feature.name: StD
feature.description: Standard Deviation: Calculate the standard deviation of a given dataset. If no Dataset is given, the output is 0.

feature.name: Mean
feature.description: Mean: Calculates the mean of a given Dataset. If no Dataset is given the out is 0.

alt.name: UI
alt.description: UserInterface: Provide interaction possibilities for the user.
UserInterface: Provide interaction possibilities for the user.

and.name: GUI
and.description: Grafical User Interface: Provide a grafical user interface to interact with. The grafical user interface must support all operations the user wants to perform. Basic number keys 0 to 9 must be provided. A display to show the results must be given.

Grafical User Interface: Provide a grafical user interface to interact with. The grafical user interface must support all operations the user wants to perform. Basic number keys 0 to 9 must be provided. A display to show the results must be given.

alt.name: ColorSchemes
alt.description: Provide different color scheme options. the user can personalize the application with these schemes.
Provide different color scheme options. the user can personalize the application with these schemes.

feature.name: Blue
feature.description: Provide an blue color scheme for the user interface.

feature.name: Black
feature.description: Provide an black color scheme for the user interface.

feature.name: Default
feature.description: Provide the default color scheme for the user interface.

and.name: Keys
and.description: The basic numbers 0 to 9 are given as buttons to press. An equals button to show the result of an equation is given. The keydisplay adjust dynamically to the chosen operations.
The basic numbers 0 to 9 are given as buttons to press. An equals button to show the result of an equation is given. The keydisplay adjust dynamically to the chosen operations.

or.name: SC
or.description: SpecialConstants: Provide quick access to some of most used cnstants in math an physics.
SpecialConstants: Provide quick access to some of most used cnstants in math an physics.

feature.name: Pi
feature.description: Pi: Key to how and use pi as 3.141592.

feature.name: EN
feature.description: EulerNumber: Key to show and use the euler number as 2,71828.

feature.name: SOL
feature.description: SpeedOfLight: Key to show and use the speed of light as 299792458.

feature.name: SOS
feature.description: SpeedOfSound: Key to show and use the speed of sound as 340.

feature.name: GC
feature.description: GravitationalConstant: Key to show and use the gracitational constant as 6.674 * 10^-11.

feature.name: OpKey
feature.description: OperationKey: For every chosen operation the operation key must be provided. For example: If addition is by the user, an button "+" will be provided in the Gui.

feature.name: Numbers
feature.description: The Numbers from 0 to 9

feature.name: Equals
feature.description: Button to get the result of an equation.

feature.name: Del
feature.description: Delete: Button to delete the parts of the enter equation.

feature.name: AC
feature.description: AllClear: Button to clear the whole display.

feature.name: LBr
feature.description: LeftBrackets: Button for left brackets.

feature.name: RBr
feature.description: RigthtBrackets: Button for right brackets.

feature.name: Display
feature.description: Provide a Display to show entered equations and calculated results.

feature.name: CLI
feature.description: Command Line Interface Provide an comand line interface for the interaction between user and system.

and.name: CH
and.description: CalculationHistory: Provide a list of previous equations with their corresponding results.
CalculationHistory: Provide a list of previous equations with their corresponding results.

or.name: EH
or.description: ExportHistorie: Provide an export possibility for previous calculations. Different file formats like xml, plain text and csv are supported. The user is free to choose the file format and the destination of the saved file.

ExportHistorie: Provide an export possibility for previous calculations. Different file formats like xml, plain text and csv are supported. The user is free to choose the file format and the destination of the saved file.

feature.name: XmlOut
feature.description: Support the xml file format as export file format.

feature.name: CsvOut
feature.description: Support the csv file format as export file format.

feature.name: PTOut
feature.description: PlainTextOut: Support the xml file format as export file format.

or.name: IDS
or.description: Possibility to import a data set for calculations. Supported file formats are xml and csv file. The user can choose the path where the import file is located.
Possibility to import a data set for calculations. Supported file formats are xml and csv file. The user can choose the path where the import file is located.

feature.name: XmlIn
feature.description: Xml files are supported as input file format.

feature.name: CsvIn
feature.description: Csv files are supported as input file format.
